title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.129 - Apportionment grievance hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.129 - Apportionment grievance hearing

State Regulations

Following department approval, service and filing, the
regulating district board shall, upon not less than 45 days' notice, conduct a
public hearing at which all public corporations and owners of parcels of real
property interested in or aggrieved by the apportionment shall be afforded an
opportunity to present documentary and/or oral testimony contesting such
apportionment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
606.129

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
